com.jme3.bullet.util

Class CollisionShapeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.bullet.util.CollisionShapeFactory

  • public class CollisionShapeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for generating collision shapes from spatials.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static java.util.logging.Logger logger
      message logger for this class

      static CollisionShape createBoxShape(com.jme3.scene.Spatial subtree)
      Create a simplified shape for the specified Spatial, based on the bounding volumes of its geometries.

    • Method Detail

      • createBoxShape

        public static CollisionShape createBoxShape(com.jme3.scene.Spatial subtree)
        Create a simplified shape for the specified Spatial, based on the bounding volumes of its geometries. TODO buggy!
        Parameters:
        subtree - the Spatial on which to base the shape (not null, unaffected)
        Returns:
        a new box/sphere CollisionShape (if spatial is a Geometry) or a CompoundCollisionShape with box/sphere shapes as children (if spatial is a Node)

      • createDynamicMeshShape

        public static CollisionShape createDynamicMeshShape(com.jme3.scene.Spatial subtree)
        Create a shape for a movable object, based on the specified Spatial.

        For mesh-accurate movable objects (CPU-intense!) use GImpactCollisionShape.

        Parameters:
        subtree - the Spatial on which to base the shape (not null, unaffected)
        Returns:
        a new HullCollisionShape (if spatial is a Geometry) or a new CompoundCollisionShape with hull shapes as children (if spatial is a Node)

      • createMergedMeshShape

        public static MeshCollisionShape createMergedMeshShape(com.jme3.scene.Spatial subtree)
        Create a shape for an immovable object, based on the specified Spatial. This version ignores terrain.
        Parameters:
        subtree - the scene-graph subtree on which to base the shape (not null, unaffected)
        Returns:
        a new MeshCollisionShape

      • createMeshShape

        public static CollisionShape createMeshShape(com.jme3.scene.Spatial subtree)
        Create a shape for an immovable object, based on the specified Spatial. This version handles terrain.
        Parameters:
        subtree - the Spatial on which to base the shape (not null, unaffected)
        Returns:
        a new MeshCollisionShape (if spatial is a Geometry) or a new HeightfieldCollisionShape (if spatial is a TerrainQuad or TerrainPatch) or a new CompoundCollisionShape with mesh/heightfield shapes as children (if spatial is a Node)

      • createVhacdShape

        public static CompoundCollisionShape createVhacdShape(com.jme3.scene.Spatial subtree,
                                                      VHACDParameters parameters,
                                                      CompoundCollisionShape addResult)
        Create a shape for a dynamic object using the V-HACD library.
        Parameters:
        subtree - the scene-graph subtree on which to base the shape (not null, unaffected)
        parameters - (not null, unaffected)
        addResult - the compound shape to append to (modified if not null)
        Returns:
        a compound shape (either addResult or a new shape, not null)
